issue.title: [Website] Add "Powered By" page to the website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1371](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1371). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See http://spark.apache.org/powered-by.html as an example. It would be useful to collect a list of projects which are using Arrow in some form

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1371?focusedCommentId=16250795) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
